alert.note: Alert for Dalton Highway Summits; Upper Koyukuk Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 02 at 5:07AM AKST until January 04 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 3 PM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...High winds and blowing snow with low visibility expected. East winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Over elevated terrain of the Upper Koyukuk Valley. * WHEN...From noon today to 3 PM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult. Blowing snow will cause low visibility over elevated terrain. Large snow drifts will form. Strong winds could blow down trees and cause power outages. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...East winds will increase today, with the strongest winds tonight into Wednesday night. The strongest winds will be over elevated terrain. Valley locations will see winds up to 30 mph and blowing snow.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for blowing snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Dalton Highway Summits; Upper Koyukuk Valley
